meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Holloway Terry Vlasich Mark McDermott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #986.

td.p: Steve Holloway, a retail store manager from Orlando, Florida
Terry Vlasich, a contacting specialist originally from Ironwood, Michigan
Mark McDermott, an editorial writer originally from Iowa (whose 3-day cash winnings total $29,502)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL TRIVIA
BASEBALL
AUSTRIA
ENGLISH LITERATURE
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
CELEBRITY SPELLING

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
